name: Spike Hike - GBJAM 2018
description:
Tiny Peter needs to reach the top of this spike-ridden tower.. why? Who knows!

A plethora of traps and hazards will do their best to stop you, the key is to not panic, but also PANIC!

Arrow keys = Move
X = Jump
Z = Roll

 (Or if you have an Xbox controller handy, try it out!)
